Class GSLeaderboardAdView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.ViewGroup
          android.widget.RelativeLayout
              com.greystripe.sdk.GSLeaderboardAdView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, GSAd
public final class GSLeaderboardAdView
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout

This is the ad view for a 728x90 leaderboard banner ad.

GSLeaderboardAdView

public GSLeaderboardAdView(android.content.Context context)
Use this constructor to create a leaderboard banner ad programmatically if you have specified your GUID in AndroidManifest.xml.

Must be called on the main UI Thread.

Parameters:
context - The Context in which to display the ad.

                           String guid)

Must be called on the main UI Thread.

context - The Context in which to display the ad.
guid - Your unique application identifier guid.
Method Detail

getId

public int getId()
Description copied from interface: GSAd
Get the ad id if one is fetched and ready to display.

Specified by:
getId in interface GSAd
Overrides:
getId in class android.view.View
Returns:
The ad id of an ad that's ready to display. If no ad is ready to display or the ad is broken, this returns -1.

refresh

public void refresh()
Fetch and display a new ad without animations.

refresh

public void refresh(boolean animate)
Fetch and display a new ad with default animations: fading in and out.

Parameters:
animate - true to animate with default animations; false otherwise.

refresh

public void refresh(android.view.animation.Animation in,
                    android.view.animation.Animation out)
Fetch and display a new ad with specified animations. If either are null, we default to fading in and out, respectively.

Parameters:
in - Animation to start on successful banner fetch.
out - Animation to start before requesting a new ad.

refresh

public void refresh(boolean animate,
                    android.view.animation.Animation in,
                    android.view.animation.Animation out)
Fetch and display a new ad with animation settings. If either animation is null, default to fading in and out.

Parameters:
animate - Whether to animate the ad in and out.
in - Animation to start on successful banner fetch.
out - Animation to start before requesting a new ad.

isAdReady

public boolean isAdReady()
Description copied from interface: GSAd
Indicates that an ad is fetched and ready to display. There is nothing that would prevent the display from occurring (e.g. no network connectivity).

Specified by:
isAdReady in interface GSAd
Returns:
True if an ad is ready to display and a display is possible
